meanings.definition: Relating to a period of 200 years.
meanings.sent1: The small town celebrated its bicentennial parade with joy.
meanings.sent2: The bicentennial event brought the community together.
meanings.sent3: The bicentennial cake was so big, it took two days to finish!
meanings.sent4: Her love for history made the bicentennial museum a treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: The bicentennial fireworks lit up the night sky in a dazzling display.

meanings.sent1: The town's bicentennial was marked with a grand festival.
meanings.sent2: Everyone gathered to celebrate the bicentennial of the school.
meanings.sent3: The bicentennial of the library was a book lover's dream come true.
meanings.sent4: The bicentennial of the nation was a time to reflect on its history.
meanings.sent5: The bicentennial of the park was a day filled with laughter and memories.
